name: Othello - Deluxe HD
description:
Othello - Deluxe HD enables you to play Othello anytime anywhere!

Othello is a classic strategy board game for iPad. Players can play against the computer with 3 AI levels (easy, med, hard), 2 players mode can challenge a friend. Connnect with Bluetooth, you can free to play against nearby opponents.


*Features*

1. Three levels of play, meeting needs of all players.

2. Play against a nearby player via Bluetooth or your friend on the same device with Two Players mode.

3. Enable to save game progress and load it next time.

4. Can tick to show possible moves.

5. Great visual effect and exciting sound effects.

6. Retina display high resolution.



*Rules*

Othello has another name - reversi. This game is played on an 8x8 board with 64 identical pieces. Two players take turns to play. The player's goal is to turn the opponent's disks into himself. The player with the most pieces on the board at the end of the game wins.
